StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetEnlistedNWADetailView]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@FromDate date.me, @ToDate date.me, @RS int = NULL, @RSS int = NULL, @SortBy int = NULL, @FinalAc.on varchar(40) = NULL AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
CREATE TABLE #ORG(Organiza.onid int) CREATE TABLE #FINAL_ACTION(FinalAc.on varchar(40))
--- sp_GetColumnData CANDIDATE_STATUS
CREATE TABLE #NWA_VIEW (PERSON_ID INT, NWA_ID INT, CONTRACT_ID INT, PERSON_NAME VARCHAR(62), GENDER_CODE CHAR (1), SSN CHAR(9), NWA_DECLARED_DATE DATETIME, EDUCATION_LEVEL VARCHAR(2), EDUCATION_CODE VARCHAR(2), CATEGORY_CODE VARCHAR(6), PROJECTED_SHIP_MONTH INT, PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE CHAR(1), PROFESSED_EXAM_SCORE INT, DATE_OF_BIRTH DATETIME, SOURCE_CODE VARCHAR(10), ASVAB_DATE DATETIME, AFQT_SCORE INT, MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE DATETIME, MEDICAL_DISPOSITION CHAR(1), RSS_NAME VARCHAR(45), NWA_LOG_NOTES VARCHAR(50), FINAL_ACTION_DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(40), NWA_DATE_STARTED_WORKING DATETIME, ACTIVITY_CODE VARCHAR(2), GT_SCORE INT, RECRUITER_LAST_NAME VARCHAR(20), STATUS_TYPE CHAR(1), STATUS_CODE VARCHAR(10), DISPOSITION_CODE VARCHAR(20))
--- GET RSSs IF COALESCE(@RSS, 0) != 0 BEGIN INSERT INTO #ORG SELECT @RSS END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO #ORG SELECT OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM ORGANIZATION_MAP OM INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO ON (OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = RO.ORGANIZATION_ID AND OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @RS AND RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RSS') END
--- GET DISPOSITION CODES IF COALESCE(@FinalAc.on, 'ALL') != 'ALL' BEGIN INSERT INTO #FINAL_ACTION SELECT @FinalAc.on END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO #FINAL_ACTION SELECT DISTINCT DISPOSITION_CODE FROM STATUS_DISPOSITION WHERE STATUS_TYPE = 'E' END
--- GET NWA VIEW DATA INSERT INTO #NWA_VIEW (PERSON_ID, NWA_ID, CONTRACT_ID, PERSON_NAME, GENDER_CODE, SSN, NWA_DECLARED_DATE, CATEGORY_CODE, PROJECTED_SHIP_MONTH, DATE_OF_BIRTH, SOURCE_CODE, RSS_NAME, NWA_LOG_NOTES, FINAL_ACTION_DESCRIPTION, NWA_DATE_STARTED_WORKING, ACTIVITY_CODE, RECRUITER_LAST_NAME, STATUS_TYPE, STATUS_CODE, DISPOSITION_CODE) SELECT P.PERSON_ID, NWA.NWA_ID, C.CONTRACT_ID, RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME) + SPACE(1) + RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, SPACE(0)) AS PERSON_NAME, MC.GENDER_CODE, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, NWA.NWA_DECLARED_DATE, NWA.CATEGORY_CODE, NWA.PROJECTED_SHIP_MONTH, MC.DATE_OF_BIRTH, NWA.SOURCE_CODE, RO.NAME, NWA.NWA_LOG_NOTES, SD.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION, NWA.NWA_DATE_STARTED_WORKING, NWA.ACTIVITY_CODE, P2.LAST_NAME, CS.STATUS_TYPE, CS.STATUS_CODE, CS.DISPOSITION_CODE FROM PERSON P INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON P.PERSON_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN NWA ON (MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = NWA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND NWA.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID IN (SELECT * FROM #ORG) AND NWA.NWA_DECLARED_DATE BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate) INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO ON NWA.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = RO.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON (NWA.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = dbo.GetMaxStatusID(CS.NWA_ID)) INNER JOIN STATUS_DISPOSITION SD ON (CS.STATUS_TYPE = SD.STATUS_TYPE AND CS.STATUS_CODE = SD.STATUS_CODE AND CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = SD.DISPOSITION_CODE) INNER JOIN PERSON P2 ON NWA.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID = P2.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CONTRACT C ON NWA.NWA_ID = C.NWA_ID
--- GET ASVAB DATA UPDATE #NWA_VIEW SET ASVAB_DATE = CA.ASVAB_DATE, AFQT_SCORE = CA.AFQT_SCORE, GT_SCORE = CA.GT_SCORE FROM #NWA_VIEW N INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_ASVAB CA ON (N.PERSON_ID = CA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND CA.ASVAB_DATE = dbo.GetMaxASVABDate(N.PERSON_ID))
--- GET EDUCATION DATA UPDATE #NWA_VIEW SET EDUCATION_LEVEL = CE.EDUCATION_LEVEL, EDUCATION_CODE = CE.EDUCATION_CODE FROM #NWA_VIEW N INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_EDUCATION CE ON (N.PERSON_ID = CE.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND CE.SCHOOL_END_DATE = dbo.GetMaxSchoolEndDate(N.PERSON_ID))
--- GET MEDICAL EXAM DATA UPDATE #NWA_VIEW SET MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE = CME.MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE, MEDICAL_DISPOSITION = CME.MEDICAL_DISPOSITION FROM #NWA_VIEW N INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_MEDICAL_EXAM CME ON (N.PERSON_ID = CME.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND CME.MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE = dbo.GetMaxMedicalExamDate(N.PERSON_ID, NULL))
--- GET PROFESSED EXAM DATA UPDATE #NWA_VIEW SET PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE = CPE.PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE, PROFESSED_EXAM_SCORE = CPE.EXAM_SCORE FROM #NWA_VIEW N INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM CPE ON (N.PERSON_ID = CPE.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND CPE.EXAM_DATE = dbo.GetMaxProfessedExamDate(N.PERSON_ID, NULL))
--- RETRIEVE DATA SELECT PERSON_NAME, PERSON_ID, NWA_ID, CONTRACT_ID, CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), NWA_DECLARED_DATE, 106) AS NWA_DECLARED_DATE, EDUCATION_LEVEL + SPACE(0) + EDUCATION_CODE AS EDUCATION, CASE CATEGORY_CODE WHEN 'R' THEN 'Regular' WHEN 'G' THEN 'Reserve-Ground' WHEN 'A' THEN 'Reserve-Air' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Prior-Service' WHEN 'O' THEN 'President''s Own' ELSE NULL END AS CATEGORY_CODE, PROJECTED_SHIP_MONTH, PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE + SPACE(1) + CONVERT(VARCHAR, PROFESSED_EXAM_SCORE) AS PROFESSED_EXAM, CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), DATE_OF_BIRTH, 106) AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, SOURCE_CODE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), ASVAB_DATE,106) AS ASVAB_DATE, AFQT_SCORE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE, 106) AS MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE, MEDICAL_DISPOSITION, RSS_NAME, NWA_LOG_NOTES, --- updated DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION so that a 'POOLEE' is displayed as 'ENLIST' CASE FINAL_ACTION_DESCRIPTION WHEN 'POOLEE' THEN 'ENLIST' ELSE FINAL_ACTION_DESCRIPTION END AS FINAL_ACTION_DESCRIPTION, SSN, CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), NWA_DATE_STARTED_WORKING, 106) AS NWA_DATE_STARTED_WORKING, GENDER_CODE, ACTIVITY_CODE, GT_SCORE, RECRUITER_LAST_NAME --- , SORT_ORDER FROM #NWA_VIEW WHERE STATUS_TYPE = 'E' AND DISPOSITION_CODE IN (SELECT * FROM #FINAL_ACTION)
--- CLEAN UP DROP TABLE #ORG DROP TABLE #FINAL_ACTION DROP TABLE #NWA_VIEW SET NOCOUNT OFF
